name: Dark Maze
description: Your task is to get out of the maze. For this, you need to find the key!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
